room_title: Escape room "Manhattan" by River City Escape Room in Richmond (VA)
room_description:
To grandmothers house we go!
but wait,
oh no

The ground rumbles and shakes,
Could it be thunder? For goodness sake!

For it is 1940, and the Manhattan project awaits!
Not all may make it out alive,
What will be your fates?

A bomb is dropping and safety you must find!
Before the radiation leaves you all behind...
